tool_description: It provides detailed information about periodic table
title: periodicTable

api_list.name: periodic table
api_list.description: It gives detailed information about elements in the periodic table.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://periodictable.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "periodictable.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
